channel.title: Execption in thread? huh?
channel.description:
Ok I was starting up my server because there was players complaining and when I went to start it back up it has this error:
[code]Starting LemonScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "2 567 3100" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1417) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:23) at server.main(server.java:27) [/code]
But it does effect us. When we log in, it wont let us in, then it says Connection lost, then back to login screen, if you try to log in it says ur account is already logged in. And it wont let you log in if you create an new account.

item.title: Execption in thread? huh?
item.dc:creator: @GoldenScape GoldenScape
item.description:
@GoldenScape wrote:

Your shops are messed up.
The beginning numbers you need 2
like @cya@Shops(tabhere) 2(tabhere) 2
You messed up 1 of the shops.

Read full topic

item.description:
@r3d4awk wrote:

Ok thx for kinda helping me XD well now I have an problem, My item spawns wont work =( I changed their X and Y coords but they still spawn at the same place… Whats wrong??

item.title: Execption in thread? huh?
item.dc:creator: @frugoo_scape frugoo scape
item.description:
@frugoo_scape wrote:

The error means that the string “2 567 3100” could not be converted to an integer.

Read full topic

item.title: Execption in thread? huh?
item.dc:creator: @r3d4awk r3d4awk
item.description:
@r3d4awk wrote:

lol i fixed it myself I finally figured it out, the word “teleport” and “4408” helped me. lol Ok i was wanting to place teleports at a place but idk how because I tried and that error pops up, plz tell me how to place objects.

Read full topic

item.title: Execption in thread? huh?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

The simplest way to put it;
The input stream is empty, thus resulting in no number to parse.

Should be simple to work out, now.

Read full topic

item.title: Execption in thread? huh?
item.dc:creator: @r3d4awk r3d4awk
item.description:
@r3d4awk wrote:

@echo off COLOR 07 title Tenacious T's compiler "F:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

=) And I dont know if this has to do with it but I have 5 errors and the errors happened BEFORE the server error:

[code]Player.java:768: cannot find symbol
symbol : method isFullHelm(int)
location: class Item
if (!Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && !Ite
m.isFullMask(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && (playerLook[0] != 1))
^
Player.java:768: cannot find symbol
symbol : method isFullMask(int)
location: class Item
if (!Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && !Ite
m.isFullMask(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && (playerLook[0] != 1))

^
client.java:1989: cannot find symbol
symbol : method randomFish()
location: class Item
TheifStall(“fish stall”, “and recieve some fish”, 40, 580*playerLevel[17], Item.
randomFish(), 1, 30, 0x340);
^

client.java:1993: cannot find symbol
symbol : method randomIngr()
location: class Item
TheifStall(“veg stall”, “and recieve some ingredients”, 20, 540*playerLevel[17],
Item.randomIngr(), 1, 30, 0x340);

 ^

client.java:18929: cannot find symbol
symbol : method Get()
location: class client
setAnimation(Get
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
5 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

But I dont think the errors are causing it. Also if you can help, help me with solving the errors =)

Read full topic
